title: Australia’s beloved gay penguin Sphen, known for raising chicks with same-sex partner, dies at 12

Oprah slams Vance's ‘Childless cat lady’ jab in DNC speech: ‘Decency and respect on the Ballot in 2024’
‘That’s my dad!’: Tim Walz’s son Gus bursts into tears during father's emotional DNC speech
content: At the Democratic National Convention in Chicago, Governor Tim Walz’s emotional speech on Thursday resonated with the audience, particularly his family. He accepted the vice presidential nomination, sharing personal struggles with infertility. His son Gus, 17, was moved to tears, highlighting the familial bond and the impact of Walz’s journey with fertility treatments.
summary: At the Democratic National Convention in Chicago, Governor Tim Walz’s emotional speech on Thursday resonated with the audience, particularly his family. He accepted the vice presidential nomination, sharing personal struggles with infertility. His son Gus, 17, was moved to tears, highlighting the familial bond and the impact of Walz’s journey with fertility treatments.

title: Oprah Winfrey urges Americans to 'choose common sense over nonsense' in DNC speech, taking subtle jabs at Trump and Vance: Key points
content: Oprah Winfrey called for unity at the Democratic National Convention, subtly critiquing Donald Trump and JD Vance. She urged support for Kamala Harris and Tim Walz, emphasizing loyalty to the Constitution and common sense. Winfrey shared her personal reasons for speaking out, highlighting America's role in her success.
summary: Oprah Winfrey called for unity at the Democratic National Convention, subtly critiquing Donald Trump and JD Vance. She urged support for Kamala Harris and Tim Walz, emphasizing loyalty to the Constitution and common sense. Winfrey shared her personal reasons for speaking out, highlighting America's role in her success.

title: Who is Pandit Rakesh Bhatt? Hindu priest who opened DNC Day 3 with vedic prayer
content: Pandit Rakesh Bhatt, a Hindu priest from Bengaluru, brought a spiritual touch to the Democratic National Convention in Chicago. He led a traditional Hindu prayer, emphasizing unity and justice through the Sanskrit concept of 'Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam.' Bhatt's involvement underscored themes of world peace and harmony, inspiring a sense of unity among the diverse attendees.
summary: Pandit Rakesh Bhatt, a Hindu priest from Bengaluru, brought a spiritual touch to the Democratic National Convention in Chicago. He led a traditional Hindu prayer, emphasizing unity and justice through the Sanskrit concept of 'Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam.' Bhatt's involvement underscored themes of world peace and harmony, inspiring a sense of unity among the diverse attendees.

title: Bill Clinton jokes about Kamala Harris' McDonald's past during DNC speech: 'She’ll break my record'
content: Former President Bill Clinton humorously highlighted Vice President Kamala Harris' early job at McDonald's during his speech at the Democratic National Convention. Clinton wanted to show Harris' dedication to public service, from her student years to her current role. He joked about his own fondness for McDonald's, famously commemorated at a Little Rock location.
summary: Former President Bill Clinton humorously highlighted Vice President Kamala Harris' early job at McDonald's during his speech at the Democratic National Convention. Clinton wanted to show Harris' dedication to public service, from her student years to her current role. He joked about his own fondness for McDonald's, famously commemorated at a Little Rock location.

title: 'Million miles an hour': Astronomy student discovers mysterious high-speed object racing through space
content: A UK astronomy student, Tom Bickle, discovered a hypervelocity object hurtling through space at one million miles per hour. Classified as either a low-mass star or brown dwarf, this object may escape the Milky Way's gravitational pull. An unusual origin is suggested, possibly from a supernova or ejection from a star cluster.
summary: A UK astronomy student, Tom Bickle, discovered a hypervelocity object hurtling through space at one million miles per hour. Classified as either a low-mass star or brown dwarf, this object may escape the Milky Way's gravitational pull. An unusual origin is suggested, possibly from a supernova or ejection from a star cluster.

title: Sphen the penguin, one half of renowned gay pair, dies
content: Sphen, a beloved gentoo penguin at Sea Life Sydney Aquarium, passed away at 11, leaving his partner, Magic, and their foster chicks. Their same-sex relationship gained international attention, symbolizing inclusivity. Magic was given time with Sphen's body to mourn. The couple inspired global audiences and even featured in Sydney’s Mardi Gras parade and educational curriculum.
summary: Sphen, a beloved gentoo penguin at Sea Life Sydney Aquarium, passed away at 11, leaving his partner, Magic, and their foster chicks. Their same-sex relationship gained international attention, symbolizing inclusivity. Magic was given time with Sphen's body to mourn. The couple inspired global audiences and even featured in Sydney’s Mardi Gras parade and educational curriculum.

title: Jujitsu and motorbikes: Ukrainian spirit remains strong despite the war
content: Artyom Kuzmich, who lost his leg in the Ukraine conflict, went viral for aiding victims at Okhmatdyt children's hospital after it was hit by a missile. A former special forces member, he excels in Brazilian jujitsu and runs a para-jujitsu school in Kyiv. He hopes to expand his motorbike club while anticipating his child's birth.
summary: Artyom Kuzmich, who lost his leg in the Ukraine conflict, went viral for aiding victims at Okhmatdyt children's hospital after it was hit by a missile. A former special forces member, he excels in Brazilian jujitsu and runs a para-jujitsu school in Kyiv. He hopes to expand his motorbike club while anticipating his child's birth.

title: Trump suddenly stops North Carolina rally mid-speech and asks for 'a doctor, please!'
'I am still younger than him': Bill Clinton jokes about Trump's age at DNC
content: Bill Clinton and Tim Walz endorsed Kamala Harris at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago. Clinton, turning 78, humorously noted he is younger than Donald Trump but did not mention the 81-year-old President Joe Biden. Clinton highlighted Harris's vision and experience, emphasizing her ability to lead and address the nation's challenges.
summary: Bill Clinton and Tim Walz endorsed Kamala Harris at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago. Clinton, turning 78, humorously noted he is younger than Donald Trump but did not mention the 81-year-old President Joe Biden. Clinton highlighted Harris's vision and experience, emphasizing her ability to lead and address the nation's challenges.

title: Musk evicts Willy Wonka actor's nephew from $13 million childhood home
Biden to Netanyahu over Gaza conflict: 'Urgency of bringing ceasefire and hostage release deal to closure'
content: President Biden discussed with Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu about a cease-fire in Gaza, highlighting its urgency. They aimed to address obstacles in upcoming Cairo talks involving the US, Israel, Egypt, and Qatar. Biden remains committed to a cease-fire despite Hamas backing off, while challenges remain around Israeli troop presence in key Gaza corridors.
summary: President Biden discussed with Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu about a cease-fire in Gaza, highlighting its urgency. They aimed to address obstacles in upcoming Cairo talks involving the US, Israel, Egypt, and Qatar. Biden remains committed to a cease-fire despite Hamas backing off, while challenges remain around Israeli troop presence in key Gaza corridors.

title: 'Should I get personal?': Trump fires back at Obamas for DNC attacks, says former president 'was very nasty’
content: Former President Donald Trump responded to criticisms from Barack and Michelle Obama during the Democratic National Convention. Trump, at a rally in Asheboro, North Carolina, accused the Obamas of personal attacks and asked supporters if he should respond in kind. Despite advice to focus on policy, Trump questioned whether to stick to this approach.
summary: Former President Donald Trump responded to criticisms from Barack and Michelle Obama during the Democratic National Convention. Trump, at a rally in Asheboro, North Carolina, accused the Obamas of personal attacks and asked supporters if he should respond in kind. Despite advice to focus on policy, Trump questioned whether to stick to this approach.

title: ‘American Airlines didn’t care’: Albany exec Dan McCoy misses DNC flight over chicken sandwich, tries to use status to board
content: Albany County Executive Dan McCoy tried to use his political influence to board an American Airlines flight after missing his boarding call while getting Chick-fil-A. Despite mentioning his title, the airline staff did not reopen the doors. McCoy and a staffer later booked a different flight. No public funds were used for the trip, said McCoy’s spokesperson.
summary: Albany County Executive Dan McCoy tried to use his political influence to board an American Airlines flight after missing his boarding call while getting Chick-fil-A. Despite mentioning his title, the airline staff did not reopen the doors. McCoy and a staffer later booked a different flight. No public funds were used for the trip, said McCoy’s spokesperson.

title: DNC Day 3: Over 1,000 protesters gather in Chicago, police presence strong amid rising clashes
content: On the third night of the Democratic National Convention, over 1,000 pro-Palestinian protesters gathered in Union Park while pro-Israel demonstrators assembled near the United Center. Despite a heavy police presence, the gatherings remained mostly peaceful, although minor injuries and arrests occurred. Green Party candidate Jill Stein criticized the police response, while Police Superintendent Larry Snelling defended the actions taken.
summary: On the third night of the Democratic National Convention, over 1,000 pro-Palestinian protesters gathered in Union Park while pro-Israel demonstrators assembled near the United Center. Despite a heavy police presence, the gatherings remained mostly peaceful, although minor injuries and arrests occurred. Green Party candidate Jill Stein criticized the police response, while Police Superintendent Larry Snelling defended the actions taken.

title: Musk's Neuralink says second trial implant went well, no thread retraction issue
content: Elon Musk's Neuralink has made progress with its brain implant technology, designed to aid paralyzed patients in controlling digital devices via thought. In a second trial, patient Alex showed no thread retraction issues unlike the first patient. The device has allowed users to interact with technology in ways like playing video games and 3D designing.
summary: Elon Musk's Neuralink has made progress with its brain implant technology, designed to aid paralyzed patients in controlling digital devices via thought. In a second trial, patient Alex showed no thread retraction issues unlike the first patient. The device has allowed users to interact with technology in ways like playing video games and 3D designing.

title: Hindu Priest Rakesh Bhatt opens DNC Day 3 with 'Om Shanti': Watch as 'Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam' resonates in Chicago
DNC Day 3: Complete schedule and IST timings
content: The Democratic National Convention in Chicago released the speaker list for its third day, headlined by former President Bill Clinton and Minnesota Governor Tim Walz. The event will start at 4:00 am IST, showcasing prominent Democrats like Senator Cory Booker and anticipated appearances from Oprah Winfrey. The theme is "A Fight for Our Freedoms."
summary: The Democratic National Convention in Chicago released the speaker list for its third day, headlined by former President Bill Clinton and Minnesota Governor Tim Walz. The event will start at 4:00 am IST, showcasing prominent Democrats like Senator Cory Booker and anticipated appearances from Oprah Winfrey. The theme is "A Fight for Our Freedoms."
